entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shamattawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 37. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 29. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 36. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
